title: Expectations for Justin Fields; Texans vs. Panthers preview; Joe Montana
itunes:title: Expectations for Justin Fields; Texans vs. Panthers preview; Joe Montana
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Victor Cruz preview the Thursday Night Football matchup between the Houston Texans and Carolina Panthers! Also, they share their expectations for Justin Fields in his first career start against the Cleveland Browns; they dive into mixed bag trivia, where they discuss quarterback debuts; they roll out a new segment called "The Roller Coaster Club" and lastly, they're joined by 4x Super Bowl Champion, Joe Montana!

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
